description: The forest was a harsh place, and a Kokiri needed to be ready to handle extreme conditions at a moment's notice. The Test of Endurance involved being tossed into a throny bramble, the Kokiri believed it would make one more resistant to nature.
tooltip: The forest was a harsh place, and a Kokiri needed to be ready to handle extreme conditions at a moment's notice. The Test of Endurance involved being tossed into a throny bramble, the Kokiri believed it would make one more resistant to nature. (+10% Health for all Melee Soldiers.)
